official_title: A bill to permit qualifying congressional candidates in general and special elections to make a free bulk mailing of campaign-related material to registered voters under the franking privilege.

summary.text: Permits qualifying congressional candidates in general and special elections to make a free bulk mailing of campaign-related material to registered voters under the franking privilege.
